# My answer
n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

# Initialize max and min
max_num = a[0]
min_num = a[0]

for i in range(1, n):
    if a[i] > max_num:
        max_num = a[i]
    if a[i] < min_num:
        min_num = a[i]

print(max_num - min_num)
